mapper.sql: a.id, a.sale_date, a.sale_count, a.sale_price, b.goods_code, b.goods_name, a.remark, a.sale_count*a.sale_price totalSalePrice, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(c.in_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),'入库',DATE_FORMAT(c.expiring_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),'到期',c.cost_price,'元成本价') goodsStorageInName
mapper.select: SELECT FROM goods_storage_ir a INNER JOIN goods_sku b ON a.goods_sku_id = b.id INNER JOIN goods_storage_in c ON c.id=a.goods_storage_in_id WHERE a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_storage_ir ( id, sale_date, goods_sku_id, sale_count, sale_price, goods_storage_in_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES ( #{id}, #{saleDate}, #{goodsSkuId}, #{saleCount}, #{salePrice}, #{goodsStorageInId}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, now() )
